reviews.review_msg: Carl is one of the best prof in the biology department.He is very funny and approachable.He doesn't make students feel stupid when we ask him questions.The marking scheme and the exams are totally fair.He makes every class so interesting.This course is recommended for people who goes to class regularly.

Carl was an excellent, fair, funny and approachable prof.  The parasitology class is small so its easy to ask questions and steer discussions toward your interests.  He is a very intelligent man that actually cares about students.  Lecture notes are online, and tests correlate directly to them. I HIGHLY recommend this course, so interesting!!
doesnt lay out the notes for the lazy student.
